mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.title AS "title", a.link AS "link", a.color AS "color", a.image AS "image", a.thumb AS "thumb", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.description AS "description", a.weight AS "weight", a.weight_date AS "weightDate", a.hits AS "hits", a.posid AS "posid", a.custom_content_view AS "customContentView", a.view_config AS "viewConfig", c.code AS "category.code", c.name AS "category.name", u.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN t_cms_category c ON c.id = a.category_id JOIN t_sys_organ o ON o.id = c.organ_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cms_article( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, category_id, title, link, color, image, thumb, keywords, description, weight, weight_date, hits, posid, custom_content_view, view_config ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{category.id}, #{title}, #{link}, #{color}, #{image}, #{thumb}, #{keywords}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{weightDate}, #{hits}, #{posid}, #{customContentView}, #{viewConfig} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cms_article SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, category_id = #{category.id}, title = #{title}, link = #{link}, color = #{color}, image = #{image}, thumb = #{thumb}, keywords = #{keywords}, description = #{description}, weight = #{weight}, weight_date = #{weightDate}, hits = #{hits}, posid = #{posid}, custom_content_view = #{customContentView}, view_config = #{viewConfig} WHERE id = #{id}
update t_cms_article SET weight = 0 WHERE weight > 0 AND weight_date < sysdate CURDATE()
